description: Lists one or more access control configurations for an index. This includes user and group access information for your documents. This is useful for user context filtering, where search results are filtered based on the user or their group access to documents.

parameters.name: IndexId
parameters.description: The identifier of the index for the access control configuration.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, Amazon Kendra returns this token, which you can use in the subsequent request to retrieve the next set of access control configurations.

nested_items.name: AccessControlConfigurations
nested_items.description: The details of your access control configurations.

nested_items.name: Id
nested_items.description: The identifier of the access control configuration.
